00060 /* No processor defines? */
00061 #if !defined(__orxPPC__) && !defined(__orxX86_64__) && !defined(__orxX86__)
00062 
00063   /* PowerPC? */
00064   #if defined(__ppc__) || defined(PPC) || defined(__PPC) || defined(__POWERPC__)

00290       /* Wii and IPhone versions can only be embedded due to the lack of dlfcn presence */

00293     #endif /* __orxWII__ || __orxIPHONE__ || __orxANDROID__ || __orxANDROID_NATIVE__ */

00297 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */

00299 
00300 /* Plugin include? */
00301 #if defined(__orxPLUGIN__)
00302 
00303   #ifdef __orxEMBEDDED__
00304 
00305     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT /* Compiling embedded plug-in => API doesn't need to be imported */
00306 
00307   #else
00308 
00309     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLIMPORT /* Compiling plug-in => API needs to be imported */
00310 
00311   #endif /* __orxEMBEDDED__ */
00312 
00313 /* External include? */
00314 #elif defined(__orxEXTERN__)
00315 
00316   #ifdef __orxSTATIC__
00317 
00318     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT /* Linking executable against orx static library */
00319 
00320   #else /* __orxSTATIC__ */
00321 
00322     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLIMPORT /* Linking executable against orx dynamic library */
00323 
00324   #endif /* __orxSTATIC__ */
00325 
00326 /* Internal (library) include */
00327 #else
00328 
00329   #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLEXPORT /* Compiling orx library => API needs to be exported */
00330 
00331 #endif

00335 #define orxALIGN(ADDRESS, BLOCK_SIZE)   (((ADDRESS) + ((BLOCK_SIZE) - 1)) & (~((BLOCK_SIZE) - 1)))
00336 
00337 #define orxALIGN16(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 16)
00338 #define orxALIGN32(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 32)
00339 #define orxALIGN64(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 64)

00347 #define orxFLAG_TEST_ALL(X, F) (((X) & (F)) == (F))
00348 
00354 #define orxFLAG_TEST(X, F) (((X) & (F)) != 0)
00355 
00361 #define orxFLAG_GET(X, M) ((X) & (M))
00362 
00368 #define orxFLAG_SET(X, A, R)  \
00369 do                            \
00370 {                             \
00371   (X) &= ~(R);                \
00372   (X) |= (A);                 \
00373 } while(orxFALSE)
00374 
00379 #define orxFLAG_SWAP(X, S) ((X) ^= (S))
